events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has classified this case under the Refund category based on customer keywords.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, I need you to confirm the order number and the item you received by mistake.
The order number is 123456. Instead of the headphones I ordered, I got a charger which I don't need.
We apologize for the mix-up. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund solution, I appreciate your help.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
As we have not received any further issues from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
